nbteditor.outdated.title: NBT Editor Outdated
nbteditor.outdated.desc: A new update has been released!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.to_edit: You must be holding an item to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.to_view: You must be holding an item to view!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.to_export: You must be holding an item to export!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.container: You must be holding a container!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.skull: You must be holding a player head to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.block: You must be holding a block to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.book: You must be holding a written book to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.signboard: You must be holding a sign to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.all_item: You must be holding an empty slot to edit a new item!
nbteditor.editor.name: Name
nbteditor.editor.unsaved.title: Item Not Saved!
nbteditor.editor.unsaved.desc: You haven't saved the item. Save changes?
nbteditor.nbt.empty_key.title: Unsupported Item!
nbteditor.nbt.empty_key.desc: This nbt editor doesn't support items with an empty string ("") as a key. Remove that key-value pair?
nbteditor.nbt.overwrite.title: That name already exists!
nbteditor.nbt.overwrite.desc: Do you want to overwrite it?
nbteditor.nbt.saving_air.title: Data Loss!
nbteditor.nbt.saving_air.desc: You are saving air, which loses its NBT data. Continue?
nbteditor.file_options.delete.title: %s
nbteditor.file_options.delete.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This cannot be undone!
nbteditor.client_chest.not_ready: §cThe client chest hasn't finished loading! Does it have a lot of data?
nbteditor.client_chest.corrupt_warning: §cSome page(s) appear to be corrupt and have been backed up separately.
nbteditor.client_chest.name_not_found: There isn't any page with that name!
nbteditor.client_chest.clear_page.title: Are you sure?
nbteditor.client_chest.clear_page.desc: This will permanently delete all 54 items in this page!
nbteditor.book.convert.formatting_saved: That book contains formatting, which isn't supported by writable books. You have received a copy instead.
nbteditor.container.title: Nbt Editor >>
nbteditor.sign.new.missing_arg: §cYou must supply the new signature! /sign edit <new signature>
nbteditor.sign.save_error: §cThere was an error saving your signature!
nbteditor.sign.load_error: §cThere was an error loading the signature, restart game
nbteditor.get.lost_item.history_hint: §aUse [run_command]{/get lostitem history}([show_text]{Click to execute}(§6/get lostitem history)) to view recent cursor contents
nbteditor.unbind_skull.no_textures: That head hasn't loaded any textures yet!
nbteditor.block_states.none: There are no block states for this block!
nbteditor.attributes.amount.autofill_key:
Hold shift for infinity
Hold ctrl for minimum
nbteditor.attributes.new_uuids.no_attrib: §cThere are no attributes on this item!
nbteditor.enchantments.tip: You can Ctrl+Click enchanted books onto items in supported inventories
nbteditor.unstackable.msg: §aItem is now unstackable! [Hover for more info]
nbteditor.unstackable.hover_msg:
A random UUID was added.
When cloning the item, make
sure to re-run this command
for all the individual items.
nbteditor.book.title: Title
nbteditor.book.author: Author
nbteditor.book.preview.click.title: §lClick Event Triggered
nbteditor.signboard.glowing.desc: Use shift to open color selector
nbteditor.formatted_text.tip: Use Ctrl+Shift+C for custom colors & Ctrl+Shift+E for events
nbteditor.config.shortcuts.desc:
Create command shortcuts like calling
/lore instead of /itemfactory display lore
nbteditor.config.enchant_level_max.desc:
Toggle showing the maximum enchantment
level after the enchantment
nbteditor.config.enchant_number_type.des:
Display enchantments with a
specific number system
nbteditor.config.key_text_size.desc:
How large the text is in the
nbt editor's key list
nbteditor.config.chat_limit.desc:
Extend the chat limit for
client-side commands
nbteditor.config.single_quotes.desc:
Allow surrounding keys and
values with single quotes
(in opened strings)

Can cause problems with text
Can make the nbt shorter
nbteditor.config.single_quotes.example:
Allowed: "{§e'§rkey with quote -> §e\§r" <-§e'§r:0}"
Not Allowed: '{§e"§rkey with quote -> §e\\§r" <-§e"§r:0}'
nbteditor.config.mac_scroll_patch.desc:
Some Mac users have reported
issues with scrolling menus.
If you are having this issue, enable this.

This is not a perfect fix, as scrolling
will have some rendering issues.
nbteditor.config.scroll_speed.desc:
Increase/decrease the speed
of scrolling in NBT Editor menus
nbteditor.config.air_editable.desc:
Allow working with air in the nbt editor menu

§eThis is an experimental feature!
§cKeep a backup of important items.
nbteditor.config.json_text.desc:
Use JSON for text instead of the
custom text format
Use /get help textformat
for more info
nbteditor.config.check_updates.desc:
Whether or not NBT Editor updates
should be shown at game startup.
Use this to disable the notification.
nbteditor.config.check_updates.minor.des:
Display large updates, which
include many new features
nbteditor.config.check_updates.patch.des:
Display small updates, which include
bug fixes and single features
nbteditor.config.client_chest_size.desc:
Increase the page limit from 100 to unlimited
This can cause freezing when scrolling
through lots of pages
This MAY not increase memory usage
nbteditor.config.screenshot_options.desc:
Add the buttons %s §rand %s
§rto the screenshot message
nbteditor.config.tooltip_overflow_fix.de:
Prevent tooltips from exiting the screen
If required, this will scale down tooltips
nbteditor.config.no_armor_restriction.de:
Allows you to put non-armor
items into armor slots
nbteditor.config.hide_format_buttons.des:
Hide all of the formats accessible via
keybind in the formatted text editors

This may allow the color dropdown
to expand out when there wasn't
previously room
nbteditor.config.special_numbers.desc:
Allow entering §6NaN§cd§r, §6Infinity§cf§r, §6-Infinity§cd§r, etc.
into the nbt editor
This is not consistent with /data (MC-200070)
nbteditor.config.aliases.desc:
Create command aliases like calling
/if instead of /itemfactory
nbteditor.config.aliases.example: Example: "nbteditor export | x" creates the alias "/nbteditor x"
nbteditor.config.aliases.extreme.desc:
Add the default "extreme" aliases,
most being a single character long
§oFor the most dedicated NBT Editor users
nbteditor.config.item_size.desc:
Display the item size in bytes, kb, etc.
on the tooltip
nbteditor.config.page_keybinds.desc:
Whether Page Up increases the page number (Normal)
or goes to the previous page (Inverted)
in the client chest
nbteditor.fancy_text_arg_type.stringify_: §cThis text contains hover events or formatting that can't be fully recreated
nbteditor.chat_length_warning_1: WARNING: The text will be truncated to
nbteditor.help_5: §6/open: §7Open the container you're holding. You can put shulker boxes inside shulker boxes!
nbteditor.help_6: §6/get <item | potion | soup | skull | hdb | colorcodes | lostitem | help | credits> [<args>]: §7Get an item or information
nbteditor.help_10: §7Help on a specific feature: §b/get help <nbteditor | clientchest | itemfactories>
nbteditor.help.nbt_3: §7Edit item nbt, as well as the item itself and item count.
nbteditor.help.nbt_4: §7In the field with the item's name, you can rename like an anvil.
nbteditor.help.nbt_5: §7When a value doesn't match the list's value (for example putting an integer into a string list), it will be highlighted yellow. It will not save.
nbteditor.help.nbt_6: §7To change the type of something, you can use the same syntax as /data:
nbteditor.help.nbt_7: §7"Str" for text, 1b for byte, 5.8d for double, 3 for integer, {} for compound, etc.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_3: §7The client chest exists on all servers and in singleplayer.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_4: §7It automatically saves when a change is made. While saving, an asterisk (*) will appear after the title.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_6: §7The << and >> buttons jump to the previous/next page with items on it, or the first/last page if none is found.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_7: §7Locking the slots prevents the removing of items in the chest, and is forced on while out of creative to prevent item loss.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_8: §7Reloading reloads the page from the file.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_9: §7Clear page deletes everything on that page, and is cannot be undone. There is a confirm dialog in case of a misclick.
nbteditor.help.item_factories_11: §6unbindskull: §7Remove a skull's link to the original owner
nbteditor.help.text_format_3: §6Used instead of JSON for formatted text
nbteditor.help.text_format_4: §6Can be toggled back to JSON in /nbteditor config
nbteditor.help.text_format_5: [FORMAT] §6Formatting uses \& for [run_command]{/get preset colorcodes}([show_text]{/get preset colorcodes}(§9§ncolor codes))
nbteditor.help.text_format_6: §6When changing colors, the format is cleared for consistency
nbteditor.help.text_format_10: §6The [show_item] event's value uses a slot id, and will default to the held item
nbteditor.help.text_format_11: §6The [show_entity] event's value uses a uuid, and will default to the targeted entity, or finally yourself
nbteditor.credits_2: §6I hope you enjoy! Don't mess with §otoo§r§6 many §c[Admin] §6ranks :D
nbteditor.credits_6: §7Ported to client sided Fabric by mega12345mega
